title: Bug 24779[Perspectives] Reference to invalid views are not removed
description: Bug 24779[Perspectives] Reference to invalid views are not removed. It already tried, and it can't.8.
OB: When the plugin was not available the last time Eclipse was closed, the workbench still retains references to the plugin's views.
EB: The workbench should have no reference to the views of a plugin that was not available the last time Eclipse was closed.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open Eclipse. 
2. Open a view from a plugin that can be easily added and removed (e.g., EditorList plugin). 
3. Open another perspective (e.g., the 'Java' perspective). 
4. Close Eclipse. 
5. Remove or move the plugin. 
6. Switch to the perspective that contains the view which no longer exists. 
7. Encounter the 'Unable to restore perspective' error message. 
8. Close and restart Eclipse to see that the error message no longer appears.
